ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Its collection and recitation are Our affair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Surely its collection and recitation are Our responsibility.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely it is for Us to have you commit it to memory and to recite it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We shall be responsible for its collection and its recitation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed assembling the Qur’an and reading it are upon Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: It is for Us to collect it and that it be recited.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely on Us (devolves) the collecting of it and the reciting of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Ours it is to gather it, and to recite it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! upon Us (resteth) the putting together thereof and the reading thereof.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We Ourself shall see to its collection and recital.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily upon us is the collecting thereof and the reciting thereof.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed it is up to Us to put it together and to recite it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It is for Us to collect it and to promulgate it:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: It is for Us to collect it and to give you (O Muhammad SAW) the ability to recite it (the Quran),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It's gathering and reciting is upon Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Upon Us is its collection and its recitation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, upon Us is its collection [in your heart] and [to make possible] its recitation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [75:17] Assuredly it is for Us to bring it together, in your breast, and to recite it, your reciting of it, that is, its flowing off your tongue.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! upon Us (resteth) the putting together thereof) preserving the Qur'an in your heart (and the reading thereof) and also preserving the reading of Gabriel to you; it is also said that this means: upon Us rests its composition of the lawful and the unlawful.
